text: Jacques de Maleville, born and baptized on June 19, 1741 in Domme, where he died on November 22, 1824, French jurisconsult and politician, was one of the drafters of the Civil Code.http://roglo.eu/roglo?p=jacques;n=de%20maleville;oc=3 == References == Category:1741 births Category:1824 deaths Category:Politicians from Nouvelle- Aquitaine Category:People from Dordogne
title: Jacques de Maleville
